de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.models
Class CommandBody

java.lang.Object
  de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.models.CommandBody
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CommandBody>
public class CommandBody
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<CommandBody>, java.io.Serializable

This class represents an "instance" of a command including parameters

See Also:
